content:
When it comes to NYC entertainment, WestHouse Hotel is nestled among the epicenter of the arts and culture of New York City. With many of the city’s finest entertainment establishments only a stone’s throw away, guests have unprecedented access to the best things to do in NYC.

Indulge in the celebrated The New York Theater District, Radio City Music Hall, New York City Ballet, New York Philharmonic, and The Metropolitan Opera during your stay in NYC. For a close to the evening, enjoy socializing and stunning views of the city on The Terrace.

Our in-house team of expert lifestyle curators will personalize your experience in New York City to meet your every desire.
